items.title: The brainbox behind Valve's Steam Labs says the number of Steam releases featuring GenAI in 2025 is 1 in 5, with 7% of all games on there now incorporating it: 'We’ve octupled last year’s figure'
items.summary: The brainbox behind Valve's Steam Labs predicts that by 2025, 1 in 5 Steam releases will feature GenAI, with 7% of current games on the platform already incorporating it. However, there is a vocal anti-AI sentiment among some artists and gamers who refuse to buy games with AI technology.

items.title: Netflix admits it used generative AI in a big sci-fi hit to cut costs

items.summary: A couple from Georgia experienced the joy of a positive pregnancy test followed by the heartbreak of losing the baby. Voice AI was used to capture their emotions, showcasing the potential ethical concerns around using AI in sensitive situations.
